survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Drone Delivery Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who have used drone delivery services to understand their satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the speed of drone deliveries?
questions.routing_logic: Applies to all respondents who have used drone delivery services.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.
questions.scripter_notes: Radio button field for single-choice response.
